title: Furniture Assembly
purpose: Assemble flat-pack and ready-to-assemble furniture quickly, securely, and with attention to detail. Ensures proper construction, stability, and professional finish.
description: Complete assembly service for furniture including desks, chairs, shelves, bed frames, and more. Includes proper tool usage, hardware organization, and quality checks. Can handle complex multi-piece assemblies and provide tips for future maintenance.

useCases.scenario: IKEA and similar flat-pack furniture assembly

canProduceWith.description: Transforms flat-pack boxes into functional furniture pieces
canProduceWith.value: Saves time, ensures proper assembly, prevents damage

canProduceWith.output: Properly secured furniture that won't wobble or fail
canProduceWith.description: Uses correct techniques and checks for stability

pricing.notes: Price varies by complexity and number of pieces. Additional charges for very large items or complex assemblies.

process.description: Unbox and organize all pieces and hardware
Review instructions and plan assembly sequence
Assemble main structure following manufacturer guidelines
Attach hardware, doors, drawers, and accessories
Quality check: stability, alignment, function test

notes: Most popular service. Can handle most major furniture brands. Specializes in IKEA, Wayfair, Amazon Basics, and similar.
